p: The animals used in the in vivo study were Swiss male albino mice (26â€“31 g body weight) that were obtained from National Institute of Health Islamabad, Pakistan. All the animals were maintained in the animal house of the Department of Pharmacy, University of Malakand. All the mice were divided into six groups and housed in individual cages. All the animals were kept under normal laboratory conditions of light/dark cycle (12/12 h) and were provided water and normal pellet diet. All the animal procedures were conducted according ARRIVE guidelines and also the approval was taken from the Departmental Animal Ethical Committee (DAEC/2019/1), University of Malakand, Pakistan.
